val:
• Shaadi.com, the world's largest online matchmaking site in which search mechanisms play a key role. Converted a monolithic search function into a microservice using Java and Kotlin Ktor.
  • This includes 100% migration of shaadi.com's mailers, matches and SEO pages with proper AB experiments, cut down of 25% latency and tracking of orders.
  • Developed key functions of the search service, such as pagination and refinement APIs, using Redis Cache, MySQL, ElasticSearch, and Singleton async connections.
